title: Steeley
author: Steeley
created_time: June 15, 2022, 07:57:35 PMLast edit: June 16, 2022, 05:10:22 PM by Steeley
content: I am hoping to unload a few cool items I own in order to save up for a loaded cas or lealana. What do I mean by zero premium, I am selling these at the cost I bought them for in order recover funds. I usually buy doubles of stuff so selling off extras. Escrow with MinerJones if necessary. Willing to take BTC as done normally here or $US via cashappLet me know if interested and I will send pics with proof of ownership. 3. Ballet Bull Market Limited Edition Wallet Unopened in box #17 of #21  $171 / BTC Equivalent + shipping4. 2021 Hatton Silver Plated Bitcoin with box - $36 / BTC Equivalent + shipping5. My first Bitcoin Niue - $108 / BTC Equivalent + shipping7. 2016 BTCC 0.05 - $405 / BTC Equivalent + shipping6. 2021 BYOB Hope and Despair 2 coin set BTC maxis and Fiat Maxis 1 oz copper 1-100 - Set #17 & 18 $93 each set/ BTC Equivalent + shipping7. 2021 Ballet Pure Bitcoin signature Set special with wood box (50 g silver 1BTC card & gold plated .1 BTC) $500 / BTC Equivalent + shipping8. Genesis Set series 2, #38 of 40 total, 7 coins, all numbered on the coins with the original box $662 / BTC Equivalent + shippingSTEELEY

comments.author: Kialara
comments.body: Hi Steeley, good luck with your sales here. Thought I may help by mentioning that these stones aren’t easy to find any more - at least anything 3.5mm and larger. Extraterrestrial peridot is one of the rarest gem materials on earth. Have a look at the asking price on this stone that’s just over 4mm… https://www.ebay.com/itm/144544778689?hash=item21a78a49c1:g:NdoAAOSwZoZid~Fm
